title: Language Learning Achievement Improvement Program Using Constructivist E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language learning theories and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Language learning course emphasizing constructivist interaction (exploration, collaboration, knowledge construction) in smartphone-based constrained environments, targeting job seekers and focusing on improving practical language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can execute at least three search strategies for linguistic problem-solving in constructivist e-learning environments
Learners achieve at least 80% interaction participation rates with peer learners during language task resolution using mobile collaboration tools
Learners demonstrate at least 15% higher performance in language tests compared to traditional learning groups based on constructivist learning experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
